page.title: 14Visitors,H.Lorton/Whinlatter
page.content: Because it is part of the{Lake {District National Park,}many people visit this area on holiday.They come to see the{lakes,}the{fells}and the {forests}and to go{fishing,climbing, {walking,pony-trekking}and{sailing. Quite a few houses and farms provide {bed and breakfast}accommodation and there are several{cottages}and four {flats}to rent.Some people stay at the {Horse Shoe Inn}or at the{caravan-site in Low Lorton.Some farmers let people {camp}in their fields. A lot of people are{tourists}passing through,mostly in{cars,}but also in {coaches,}on{bikes,}on{foot}or,very occasionally,on{horseback. In the village they often stop at the{post-office/shop,}the{Horse Shoe {Inn}or the{White Ash Barn cafe}and,on Whinlatter,at the{Visitors Centre}or {picnic-areas.
